```{r}
first <- as.integer(readline(prompt = "Please input the first integer: "))
second <- as.integer(readline(prompt = "Please input the second integer: "))

print(paste0("The sum of the two integers is : ", first + second))
print(paste0("The difference of the two integers is : ", first - second))
print(paste0("The product of the two integers is : ", first * second))
print(paste0("The quotient of the two integers is : ", first / second))
```
